name: boozily
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that involves a lot of alcohol or that shows that someone has drunk a lot of alcohol: People were gyrating and wiggling boozily on the dance floor. A group of young men turned up, boozily boisterous. Related word
boozy
More examplesFewer examplesThe group stumbled loudly and boozily out of the bar and down the street. The audience cheer boozily at every joke.He sat in the corner chuckling boozily to himself. Rum is a key ingredient in this boozily rich chocolate cake.
